attributes.action: Make laws to Insults Prophets and God Revealed Religion
attributes.additional_details: In order to stop publishing, printing, making videos or passing any remarks against any God revealed Religion, there is need to make strict laws that can ban any type of publication, on electronic or printing media, in public or in private, against any Prophet Peace be upon all of them, Any Revealed books of Allah SWT, and against any religion especially Islam by any means, that creates hate-ridge among the communities living in our good country.
